name: Climbing Course
description:
This game is about a climbing. Climbing a wall. Simple, right?

Made for ScoreSpace 9 in 72 hours. The theme was climbing.

Programming and stuff - eL'teammate. Climbing holds art by Sway. Music "Caketown" by Mattew Pablo (CC-BY-SA 3.0).

Unfortunaly, even this game is intended to work with online scoreboards, but rock climberI'm having issues with cross-domain requests. Therefore, game has an offline scoreboard system. Got above 100m? Dm me: eL'teammate#4304. 

Offline scoreboards will appear here, as soon as I got enough results.

Good luck, Rock Climbers!ock climber
